com.bit6.sdk

Class Bit6

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bit6.sdk.Bit6

  • public class Bit6
extends java.lang.Object
    Bit6 is for interaction between the Bit6 framework and application

      • init

        public void init(android.content.Context context,
        java.lang.String apikey,
        int environment)
        Configures Bit6 instance, setting all required fields.
        Parameters:
        context - Application context
        apikey - Bit6 API key
        environment - production or development

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Destroys Bit6 instance, nullifies all members and destroys all connections. Calling init() is required for using Bit6 instance next time.

        cb - Callback object with onResponse(boolean success, String msg) method. The method is called on UI thread.

      • createGroup

        public void createGroup(java.lang.String id,
               Group.Permissions perms,
               org.json.JSONObject meta,
               ResultHandler cb)
        Creates a group
        Parameters:
        id - must be unique value or null. If null - the system will create a unique id
        perms - group permissions or null to use the default system values
        meta - meta info for this group. Could be null.
        cb - Callback object with onResponse(boolean success, String msg) method. The method is called on UI thread.

      • updateGroup

        public void updateGroup(java.lang.String id,
               Group.Permissions perms,
               org.json.JSONObject meta,
               ResultHandler cb)
        Updates the group
        Parameters:
        id - group id
        perms - group permissions or null to use the default system values
        meta - meta info for this group. Could be null.
        cb - Callback object with onResponse(boolean success, String msg) method. The method is called on UI thread.

      • deleteGroup

        public void deleteGroup(java.lang.String id,
               ResultHandler cb)
        Leaves the group
        Parameters:
        id - group id
        cb - Callback object with onResponse(boolean success, String msg) method. The method is called on UI thread.
